Text:
I believe this is the real deal, folks.  The first track I am listening to is definitely the same sounding as what DT released on YouTube a few weeks ago.  

THANKS KIRILL!!!

Yeah, it is the real deal...
Listening to the whole thing right now. Sounds as complex as Systematic Chaos, but really, really good. First three are epic tracks!

Also not a shame if you just spent over $100 in tickets and are planning to buy a shirt there too.  I met Mangini once when he was playing with Missing Persons.  He was one of the best drummers I've ever seen!
People have been criticizing this album quite a bit, but i think its quite good. Basically what i expect.
